title: Câmara (Jorge da)
body: He was known by the name of the Poet, but it is unknown if he cultivated poetry. He was appointed the general governor of this archipelago on the 18th of January 1614 and took office on the 17th of December of the same year.

1614: Appointment as general governor of the archipelago
1614-12-17: Assumption of the office of general governor of the archipelago
